Export.Routine:
INWEINVEHeader
#include COMConst #include COMSYS #include INConst
IsManagersView() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Determines whether this is the managers view of the form. ; The 'M' in YPARA is passed in from the button on the 'Perform Stocktake' form (INWEINVD) ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: $$$YES if manager view ; ; History: ; 23-Apr-2008 PJones We assume this is the manager's view if ; IsCountProcessClosed (because we can only get into ; manager's view in this status, and can't get into ; non-manager's view - could be dangerous if these ; assumptions change) Maybe ideally Manager's and ; non-manager's views should be different forms ; 12-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014769: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnIsManager,idStocktake
set blnIsManager = $$$NO set idStocktake = $$$KEY1($get(YKEY))
if $piece($get(YPARA),Y,1)="M" { set blnIsManager = $$$YES
} elseif (idStocktake) '= "" { if $$IsCountProcessClosed^INWEINVPStatus(idStocktake) { set blnIsManager = $$$YES } } quit blnIsManager
OnBeforeButtonLine() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Makes the form read only if the Stocktaking has been closed. ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 13-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014769: Use standard status check routine. ; 08-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014769: Changed $$$EnumINSTOCKTAKESTATUSClosed to ; $$$EnumINSTOCKTAKESTATUSStocktakeComplete ; 26-Oct-2007 shobby SRBR014557: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if $$IsStocktakeComplete^INWEINVPStatus(YKEY) { set $$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)=$$$EnumReadOnly } quit
OnAfterPrimaryKey(pYKEY="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Store some parameters in a temporary structure for use by the grid lines. ; ie YPARA will contain information about whether this form is being shown ; in the 'Edit Stocktake Count' mode or the ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 12-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014769: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set ^CacheTempStocktakePara(YUSER,"YPARA") = $get(YPARA) set ^CacheTempStocktakePara(YUSER,"YAUSWAHL") = $get(YAUSWAHL) quit
OnAfterDataFields(pYKEY="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Load the edit grid ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 03-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: Remove explicit call to VAR routine; retain ; functionality during count without building list of ; items. ; 26-Oct-2007 shobby SRBR014557: Don't allow editing if we are not on the ; last count. ; 9-Aug-2006 JW SR14730: Don't Store all, macros. ; 22-May-2006 JW SR14659: Do not update container ; 03-May-2006 PP&JW SR14508: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idForm,YAUSWAHL
kill ^CacheTempLocked(YUSER)
set idForm="INWEINVELINE"
set $$$COMGridEditParameterSharedForm(YAUSWAHL) = $$$YES set $$$COMGridEditParameterMaximumHeight(YAUSWAHL) = 600 set $$$COMGridEditParameterGridName(YAUSWAHL) = idForm set $$$COMGridEditParameterEnabled(YAUSWAHL) = ($$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)'=$$$EnumReadOnly) && $$IsEnabled() set $$$COMGridEditParameterContainer(YAUSWAHL) = "INWEINVEHeader" set $$$COMGridEditParameterDontUpdateContainer(YAUSWAHL) = $$$YES set $$$COMGridEditParameterDontStoreAll(YAUSWAHL) = $$$YES
$$$GRIDStart(idForm,pYKEY) quit
OnBeforeSave(pYKEY) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Routine to do any checks before saving the record. ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 10-Oct-2008 GRF SR15810: use GridSave Macro (only place still calling ; via Interface routine) ; 03-May-2006 PP&JW SR14508: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strStatus
set strStatus = $$$GRIDSave(pYKEY)
if $$$ISERR(strStatus) { set Q = $$$QDontSave do ReturnError^COMUtils(strStatus) } quit strStatus
GetCount() new intCount
set intCount="" if (YUCI'="") && (YUSER'="") { if $data(^CacheTempStockTake(YUCI,YUSER,"M",15)) { set intCount = ^CacheTempStockTake(YUCI,YUSER,"M",15) set $piece(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"M",1),Y,15) = intCount } } quit intCount
OnBlur() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Store the 'Count Number' field in a variable that can be used to keep the 'Perform Stocktake' ; screen in sync. ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 26-Oct-2007 shobby SRBR014557: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (YUCI'="") && (YUSER'="") { set ^CacheTempStockTake(YUCI,YUSER,"M",15) = $get(YINHALT) } quit
IsEnabled() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Last count in the stocktake? ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 26-Oct-2007 shobby SRBR014557: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new objData
set objData = $$GetFormData^COMUtilForm(YFORM,"M") quit ($piece(objData,Y,6)=$$$INWEINVPNumberofCounts(YFELD))
OnBeforeFormConstruction(pYKEY,pYFELD) if $$$INWEINVPStatus(pYFELD)'<3 { set YHID = 2 } quit
OnBeforeFormConstructionTitle() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Can display different headings on the form when called from different buttons ; in the 'Perform Stocktake' screen. ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 12-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014769: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if $$IsManagersView() { if (+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesSESDF($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) { set YKOPF = "Ajuste de Inventario (Visualização do Gerente)" } else { set YKOPF = YKOPF_" "_$$$Text("IN00792") ; "(Manager's View)" } } quit
